name: A Fireplace Game
description:
This game was created for the Movie Game Jam February 2018.

The goal of the game is to collect everything you need to start the fire and film it for a fireplace movie.

Controls: 

WASD to move around

SPACE to interact when icon appears in upper left corner

ENTER when dialogue box is up to either go to next lines of dialogue or skip scrolling text

TAB to pause

The game is best played in 640x480 resolution, can be played in full screen or windowed mode.
